fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(Program_Family__c == 'Behavioral Health'), (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * (BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12) + ((BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.02) * BLANKVALUE(PMPM__c, 0) * 6)), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Commercial'), OR(Program_Family__c == 'Prediabetes', Program_Family__c == 'Weight Management'), BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) == 1.00), (608.00 * (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10)), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), OR(Program_Family__c == 'Prediabetes', Program_Family__c == 'Weight Management'), BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) == 1.00), (608.00 * (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.08)), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Commercial'), Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes'), (0.25 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * (BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.25 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Commercial'), NOT(Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes')), (0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * (BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes'), (0.20 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * (BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.20 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), NOT(Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes')), (0.08 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * (BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.08 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * (BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12 )))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Gross Program ARR Copy Formula Update

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(Program_Family__c, 'Diabetes', BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.25 * BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.25 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0), 'Hypertension', BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0), 'Weight Management', IF(BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) == 1.00, 500 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 + BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Year_2_Price__c, 0) * MAX(BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) - 12, 0), BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Year_2_Price__c, 0) * MAX(BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) - 12, 0)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0), 'Prediabetes', IF(BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) == 1.00, 500 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 + BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Year_2_Price__c, 0) * MAX(BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) - 12, 0), BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Year_2_Price__c, 0) * MAX(BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) - 12, 0)) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0), BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0))
fieldUpdates.name: Gross Program TCV Copy Formula Update

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(Program_Family__c == 'Behavioral Health'), (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0)) + ((BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.02) * BLANKVALUE(PMPM__c, 0) * 6)), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Commercial'), OR(Program_Family__c == 'Prediabetes', Program_Family__c == 'Weight Management'), UnitPrice__c == 1.00), (608.00 * (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.10)), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), OR(Program_Family__c == 'Prediabetes', Program_Family__c == 'Weight Management'), UnitPrice__c == 1.00), (608.00 * (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * 0.08)), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Commercial'), Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes'), (0.25 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.25 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Commercial'), NOT(Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes')), (0.1 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.10 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes'), (0.2 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.20 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), NOT(Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes')), (0.08 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * 0.08 * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12, (BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * 12 + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))) + BLANKVALUE(Currently_Enrolled_Members__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Incremental_Sales_Price__c, 0) * 12 )))))))

(BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes', NOT(Exclude_Enrollment__c)), (0.2 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))), IF(AND(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.Opp_Owner_Role__c, 'Health Services'), NOT(Program_Family__c == 'Diabetes'), NOT(Exclude_Enrollment__c)), (0.08 * BLANKVALUE(Product_Participants__c, 0) * ((BLANKVALUE(UnitPrice__c, 0) - (BLANKVALUE(Estimated_At_Risk_PPPM__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Estimated_Partner_Admin_Fees__c, 0))) * BLANKVALUE(Quantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Up_Front_Per_Member__c, 0))) )))))))
